title: Car Manufacturer Parts
overview: 1. This site has different features for different roles. There is two role admin and user.
2. Only admin has permit to go more page like All User, manage all orders, add a product.
3. Admin can add item , Update item and delete items.
4. Implemented login system for authorising the Clients and order how much you need.
5. You can pay using your credit card.
6. dashboard page they clients can order and pay for specific products. If paid, the client will see paid and TxnId.
7. For an admin role user there in the dashboard he can cancel any unpaid order . make other admin and my profile page.
8. This site is protected using JsonWebToken
